video_file_location.description: Will be suffixed with /<size>.<format>, i.e. /md.png. Uploaded sizes must be: md, lg, xl, xxl. Uploaded formats must be png (for the poster), webm, mp4

background_gradient_start.description: The start of the gradient, i.e. rgba(123, 123, 123, 0) (should always end with 0)
